channel.title: Can't create inlets/outlets for subpatches
channel.description: Hi all, I am new to Axoloti and trying to see how polyphony works. So I am creating subpatches as explained in User Guide, but no inlets or outlets are created. What I am doing: a) creating embedded subpatch within the main patch (it is saved), putting inlets/outlets objects there, setting subpatch to polyphony and clicking update - only polyphony field is created on the subpatch interface. If I choose "Edit object definition" and add inlets/outlets there and press Update button, they are not created. When opening "Edit object definition" again the list of inlets/outlets is empty again. b) creating a separate subpatch, putting in/out objects there, setting subpatch to polyphony. Creating main patch and adding subpatch there - no inlets/outlets are being created for it but polyphony field exists. Trying to add them via "Edit object definition" and get nothing as in the previous case. Please advice.

item.title: Can't create inlets/outlets for subpatches
item.dc:creator: @AndrewChi
item.description:
@AndrewChi wrote:

For subpatches, you have to use the 'inlet' objects, not 'input' and 'output', those are for the physical connections of the Axoloti.

Happy patching!

Read full topic

item.title: Can't create inlets/outlets for subpatches
item.dc:creator: @takeoff
item.description:
@takeoff wrote:

Hi all, I am new to Axoloti and trying to see how polyphony works. So I am creating subpatches as explained in User Guide, but no inlets or outlets are created.

What I am doing:
a) creating embedded subpatch within the main patch (it is saved), putting inlets/outlets objects there, setting subpatch to polyphony and clicking update - only polyphony field is created on the subpatch interface. If I choose "Edit object definition" and add inlets/outlets there and press Update button, they are not created. When opening "Edit object definition" again the list of inlets/outlets is empty again.

b) creating a separate subpatch, putting in/out objects there, setting subpatch to polyphony. Creating main patch and adding subpatch there - no inlets/outlets are being created for it but polyphony field exists. Trying to add them via "Edit object definition" and get nothing as in the previous case.

Please advice.

Read full topic
